data.eml:eml: New species of Ornebius (Orthoptera: Mogoplistidae, Mogoplistinae) from Siargao Island of the Philippines

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tan, Ming Kai, Ingrisch, Sigfrid, Baroga-Barbecho, Jessica B., Yap, Sheryl A. (2019): New species of Ornebius (Orthoptera: Mogoplistidae, Mogoplistinae) from Siargao Island of the Philippines. Zootaxa 4590 (1): 166-176, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4590.1.7
